post.title: Two Thumbs Up on New Comcast Service
post.title_plain: Two Thumbs Up on New Comcast Service
post.content:
Jeff Sandquist and Scoble have gotten their new ComCast boxes and apparently the service rocks. Mine gets installed Sunday. 

(side note – Does anyone still use Scoble’s first name or has Scoble transcended the whole first-name/last-name thing and moved directly to single name status?)
post.excerpt: Jeff Sandquist and Scoble have gotten their new ComCast boxes and apparently the service rocks. Mine gets installed Sunday.  (side note – Does anyone still use Scoble’s first name or has Scoble transcended the whole first-name/last-name thing and moved directly to single name status?)
